About

I am a Software developer working for a voice based platform. I am really interested and fascinated to learn about technology and trying out different projects and I am also interested to collaborate on open source projects (when I get the confidence and feel ready). I am looking forward to learn and write about technical concepts that I find interesting and would be helpful for others.

For my static blog site, I used Poole since it gives you a mobile friendly design and complete set up for Jekyll site. There are lot of other themes that you can use from Jekyll sites. However I chose Poole since it support for a wide gamut of HTML elements and syntax highlighting, courtesy Jekyllâ€™s built-in support for Rouge. There are currently three themes built on Poole:

  • Hyde
  • Lanyon

If you like my website, you can follow me on @divyaspec

Thanks!

Setup

Some fun facts about the setup of this project include:

  • Built for Jekyll
  • Developed on GitHub and hosted for free on GitHub Pages
  • Coded with Sublime Text 2, an amazing code editor
  • Designed and developed while listening to music like Blood Bros Trilogy

Have questions or suggestions? Feel free to open an issue on GitHub or ask me on Twitter.

Thanks for reading!
